content: I'm pretty sure my soundbar is compatible with Netflix, I just double-checked the manual. I got it on sale at Best Buy last week, and I've been loving the improved sound quality it's brought to my movie nights. Speaking of which, I was thinking of rearranging the furniture in the living room again to create an even cozier atmosphere for our movie night. Do you have any tips on how to set up the perfect cozy movie night layout?
